name: Walking Simulator (itch)
description:
Created as a companion art piece for a photographic project titled Walking Simulator.

Controls:

• Standard first person controls.

• Use the Mouse to look.

• Use the WASD or Arrow keys to walk.

• To Quit, use Command + Q.

System Requirements:

• Currently works only on Macintosh Computers (sorry).

• Should work on most versions of OSX, but will be more stable on the latest version.

• Will run best on computers made after 2012.
